name: WODTogether Whiteboards
author: WODTogether, Inc.

sections.description:
Allows embedding of WODTogether whiteboards into your blog posts automatically.

Learn more about WODTogether
sections.installation:
1. Upload wodtogether-whiteboards.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Configure settings via the Settings / WODTogether page
sections.changelog:
3.3.1

  • just a touch up to force update

3.3.0

  • adding a timestamp for the widget loader request to ensure fresh code daily
  • loading over https

3.2.0

  • adding option for inline results and comments
  • removing old unused option to display wods

3.1.0

  • adding program id option to show whiteboards from only 1 program

3.0.3

  • some css tweaks to add classes and add some backwards compatibility

3.0.2

  • moving the limit of how many widgets pull WOD details to client

3.0.1

  • updating to the correct api target

3.0.0

  • changing to javascript SDK, updating whiteboard embed to be client side

2.0.8

  • bug fix for WODs showing up on pages when they should not have

2.0.7

  • adding ability to embed Todays WOD on static page instead of in blog posts

2.0.6

  • adjusting counter position, handling click directly on counter

2.0.5

  • adding counter to whiteboard button for number of users who have posted

2.0.4

  • making css more targeted for Open Whiteboard btn

2.0.3

  • changing button to a to try and be more compatible with some stripping plugins

2.0.2

  • minor bugfix

2.0.1

  • Bugfix for days without whiteboards

2.0

  • Redesigning to pop-up shadowbox style whiteboards

1.1.0

  • Adding an auto-resize feature to attempt automatically setting the height of whiteboard iframes

1.0.2

  • Adding some help text to Gym ID setting
  • Adding direct link to help page

1.0.1

  • Correcting svn tagging

1.0

  • Initial release
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload wodtogether-whiteboards.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Configure settings via the Settings / WODTogether page

short_description: Allows embedding of WODTogether whiteboards into your blog posts automatically.
description:
Allows embedding of WODTogether whiteboards into your blog posts automatically.

Learn more about WODTogether

upgrade_notice.2.0: New design: WODs will be written out in your blog's style, and a button will be shown for opening a shadowbox with the full whiteboard
upgrade_notice.1.1.0: New feature: option to attempt automatically setting the height of whiteboard iframes
